grades_persistent_subsection.name: course_id
grades_persistent_subsection.description: Course key of the containing course. In the format course-v1:org+course+run for courses created after DATE and in the format org/course/run for older courses.

grades_persistent_subsection.name: user_id
grades_persistent_subsection.description: unique user ID, matching user_info_combo and users tables

grades_persistent_subsection.name: usage_key
grades_persistent_subsection.description: Usage key of the subsection. (This is sometimes known as module_id or location. In the format `` block-v1:org+course+run+type@sequential+block@1234`` for courses created after DATE and in the format i4x://org/course/sequential/1234 for older courses.

grades_persistent_subsection.name: earned_all
grades_persistent_subsection.description: The user’s aggregated total_weighted_earned score in the subsection, calculated by summing all weighted_earned values of all problems in the subsection.

grades_persistent_subsection.name: possible_all
grades_persistent_subsection.description: The aggregated total_weighted_possible score in the subsection, calculated by summing all weighted_possible values of all problems in the subsection.

grades_persistent_subsection.name: earned_graded
grades_persistent_subsection.description: The user’s aggregated total_weighted_earned score in the subsection, calculated by summing all weighted_earned values of all graded problems in the subsection.

grades_persistent_subsection.name: possible_graded
grades_persistent_subsection.description: The aggregated total_weighted_possible score in the subsection, calculated by summing all weighted_possible values of all graded problems in the subsection.

grades_persistent_subsection.name: first_attempted
grades_persistent_subsection.description: Time of the user’s first attempt at a problem in the subsection. If the user has not attempted a subsection, the entry for that subsection will be absent.

grades_persistent_subsection.name: created
grades_persistent_subsection.description: Time the subsection grade was first calculated for this user for this subsection.

grades_persistent_subsection.name: modified
grades_persistent_subsection.description: Time the subsection grade was last updated for this user for this subsection.

description: grades_persistent is the table that keeps track of learners' grades down to the course subsection level. It's generated by the simeon CLI tool from the file grades_persistentsubsectiongrade-analytics.sql in the SQL bundle.
